documents.title: TPT_Pricing Model_vFinal (Live)
documents.content:
,,

,Plan,Pricing Principles at Launch

,All,Max box price should be $250 

,Fresh/Topper/Mixed,Max freezer fill is 1/3 a small NYC apt freezer

,Fresh,Aim to price lower than TFD but only if we can make PC2 margins and economics work

,All,Charge shipping separate to box price

,All,Shipping free in first order

,All,Price per day for trial is same as for regular box before discount

,All,Price per lb does not need to decrease as calories increase within same plan although it should go in that general direction

,All,"If we ship the same amount of product, the price should be the same"

,,

,Step,Description

,1: Import costs,All costs by plan imported into pricing file

,2: Benchmark,Competitors benchmarked to build up their pricing curves

,3: Scenarios,"High level pricing scenarios chosen per plan - final scenarios chosen:
- Fresh: Match TFD prices excluding shipping fee. Fresh is headline price to fix rest to
- Mixed: Should be 5-15% below Fresh depending on size and margins
- Topper: Should be 55-62.5% of Fresh price for 50% of product depending on size and margins
- Dry: Should be lowest price and price at 38% margins"

,4: Smooth pricing,Scenarios lead to choppy pricing. This was then smoothed

,5: Check PC2 / ROIs,PC2 and ROI reviewed to increase prices and improve margins where they were low

,6: Make steps,"If giving the same qty of product for 2 or more different SKUs, the prices were matched to create some stepped pricing"

,,

,,

,Type,Elements to Change in Price Test

,Architecture issue,Ensure same amount of food in box is always the same price

,Architecture issue,Review price per Lb curves i.e. price per LB should go down as calories increase

,Architecture issue,Review PC2 margins by calories within plan; and PC2 margins across calories

,Competitor pricing,Test lowering Air Dried price to have lower entry price point to increase TAM

,Competitor pricing,Test lowering Fresh price to be more competitive with Farmers Dog & Ollie

,Competitor pricing,Test lowering Mixed price to sit in appropriate area between Fresh & Air Dried (being wary where Pantry Fresh would be)

,Architecture issue,"Lower price for larger dogs more than smaller dogs to encourage share of larger, higher ROI dogs"

documents.title: Demo Session Sign-Up Sheet
documents.content:
,,,,,,,,,,

Date,Name of the Topic,Brief explanation (max. two sentences),Is it already in production?,Name of the Alliance/Tribe/Squad(s),Name of the Presenter(s),Link to relevant JIRA Ticket / Repository,Preliminary order for meeting ,Video Link,HM Followup,

12/2/2025,Merchandising Widgets,"Configurable merchandising widgets  in the new Elysium store. Markets can self service configure their own banners (essentially ""internal ads"") inside the store to foster menu exploration and promote specific categories. ",Yes,Customer Mega Alliance / Shopping Journey,Thomas Gamper Feitoza Shruti Patil,https://github.com/hellofresh/shared-mobile-modules,2,,x,

12/2/2025,"Deploying services with a brand, country and multi-region variation ","The multi-variant pipeline enables teams to configure and deploy the same application in multiple configurations within a single region, eliminating the need for separate deployments per country or brand. The multi-region pipeline enables teams to deploy their services in 3 regions, Europe, North America, Oceania, reducing the complexity of managing multiple deployments.
",Yes,Release Engineering- Foundations Alliance ,Lobna Naguib Richard Palm,https://github.com/hellofresh/ftcp-open-application-model/commit/9b3c5122a47c152a26229e59f21b1c1441f32927,5,,x,

12/2/2025,Databricks & Unity Catalog Platform Automation,"The current Databricks platform faces infrastructure, governance, and automation challenges, slowing onboarding and limiting features like Iceberg, interoperability, and databricks Compute and GenAI.This project introduces Unity Catalog and automates Databricks infrastructure to strengthen governance and improve team productivity",UAT,Data Streaming and Operations-Foundations Alliance ,Karunai Ragavan S,"https://github.com/hellofresh/databricks-automation
https://hellodev.hellofresh.io/project/databricks/docs/databricks-automation",,,o,

12/2/2025,Ad progression - customized funnels based on value propsitions,"Currently, this is very little connection between the marketing ad that a user clicks on and the conversion funnel. We are testing personalized funnels that dynamically change based on the message of the marketing ad a user clicks on (e.g.; users clicking on a health ad will go through a health-themed conversion funnel). ",Yes,"Conversion Comms Squad, Growth Alliance",Harneet Singh Alvaro Magalhaes,"Statsig 
JIRA (HF) 
JIRA (Factor) 
Slide deck",6,,x,

12/2/2025,Bulk Upload Recipe info in CCM,"The Bulk Upload feature allows you to update large amounts of recipe-level information—specifically pricing details (surcharge, mods), merchandising tags, and labels—for a full menu week using a single CSV file.

Goal: Save you up to X hours of manual configuration per week and keep our menus scalable and accurate.",Yes,Shopping Platform Team - Active Journey Alliance,Priyank Khanna Enrico Carraro João Cheffer Prado Brittney Barnes,CCM Bulk Upload on Menu's Recipes: Quick Start Guide for Editors (Beta),,,o,

12/2/2025,New Cooking Experince on the App ,,,"Growth Alliance, Active Journey Alliance ",Wladimir Gaus Srishti Shah,,1,,,

12/2/2025,Automated Cluster Physical Box Business Marts,"Launching 3 new Business marts covering Physical box concept for operational use cases across Automated Cluster DCs (end-to-end box journey, physical box products and complete BOM)",Yes ,Ops Intelligence/ Analytics Enablement,Alex Goodwin Dragos Simionescu Audrya Kerenhappukh Zauresh Zhumayeva ,https://github.com/hellofresh/ops-intelligence-ae/tree/ae4adfee4e21a973c35a0fe319123991f558fe44/snowflake/dbt/ops_intelligence/models/business_mart/order_creation,,,o,

12/2/2025,FreshChat on Hellodev,"Integrating FreshChat(ChatGpt for Hellofresh) interface into Hellodev to reduce friction, unify the Builder experience and get instant response",Yes,Foundations,TBD,"https://hellodev.hellofresh.io/chat

 Repo: https://github.com/hellofresh/hellodev/tree/master/plugins/fresh-chat",,,x,

12/2/2025,Olympus: Image RAG for Concorde,TBA,Yes,Operations Mega Alliance / Menu-To-Content + ML SOlutions,Benjamin Bertincourt Louis Lippmann,https://github.com/hellofresh/mls-genai-solutions,3,,x,

12/2/2025,P500 Funnel & Menu Personalization,"A new questionnaire where we ask prospects for their meal preferences like rating their proteins and cuisines, letting us know of ingredients to avoid, and nutrition goals.

Using this data that we're now storing, we've partnered with squad personalization to provide customers with a more personalized set of menu defaults and menu ranking.",Yes - Experiment,"Growth Mega Alliance / Conversions Tribe / Funnel Squad

Food Systems Alliance / Menu Personalization Tribe / Squad Personalization",Marie Crumpton Tommaso Cremonini Michael Johnson Alejandra Garcia Ashwin Samtani,"Jira Epic
Figma
Working Doc
Slide deck",4,,,x

1/13/2026,Menu Search,"To support menu discovery for P500, we built and launched a web-only MVP menu search feature for Chefs Plate, ran successful non-inferiority experiments in CK, CA and US and are now live for 100% in these markets. We gathered behavioral and survey data about how users use full text search to discover recipes.","Yes (CK, CA, US)",Consumer Mega Alliance,Stefano Palazzo Tushar Raina,https://github.com/hellofresh/web/blob/master/app/spaces/store/modules/food/shared/components/search,,,,
